channel.title: New project not related to rs. Need gfx!
channel.description:
Hello Guys and Gals of mopar there is another game I play called evony. It has tons of players. They open new servers every few months where anyone can go if they want a fresh start. Hundreds of ppl go to each new server and spend a minimum of 30$. Theres a few players that even drop 1000$. But everyones mad(well I guess more like dis-appointed) at the devs. Why? well simply becuz all the devs care about is money. There are no new updates. But the game is soo fudgeing addictive too many players. But like i just said there are no new updates. Plus you wont get banned for anything. Not jackshit! Years ago you would basically get banned just for saying the word bot, now its not even monitored and u can say "yeah im botting" "heres my script if you want it" "and a link to the site where i got the bot from" Saying these things will not get you banned. Nothing will happen, Nothing at all.
So where do I come in? I want to make a game like evony. Me and a one of my other mates of gonna give this a try. We are looking for more devs if anyone is intrested. I will be updating this thread as we develop this project.
To get to the game site just google evony it will be the first one.
EDIT:Need a gfx!!!!!!!!
Updates: [b]6/14/15[/b] Created tons of integers for the players items count number and few other things. Created strings for the house information lvl 1-25, created intergers for the time to level up the building and, for the amount of resources it cost. Created strings for the hotel information lvl 1-25, created intergers for the time to level up the building and, for the amount of resources it cost. Created strings for the house information lvl 1-25, created intergers for the time to level up the building and, for the amount of resources it cost. Started on a way to save the players information.(Have errors I need to fix and not 100% done) Created strings for info and intergers for attack, defense, speed, traintime, and capacity for laborers, longswords, scims, scouts, and vikings. [b]6-16-15[/b] Created more ints and strings for other buildings and troops. New buildings:Car dealership and library. New Troops: Archers, Horsemen, and Wagons. [b]6-17-15[/b] started working on client. Made some basic (Yes I know they are terrible) Sprites. (Also my background pink colors are different lol) [img]http://i.imgur.com/uFyUwz7.png?1[/img] EDIT: Just saw that I made an error on this one [img]http://i.imgur.com/auEkFjw.png?1[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/P94FcfW.png?1[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/e2tRsPs.png?1[/img] [b]6-19-15[/b] Worked on client more. Made a cache-downloader.(not fully functional yet) Worked on some more sprites. [img]http://i.imgur.com/Q6360FV.png?1[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Rk7x4ox.png?1[/img]

Because hash tagging is for twitter.
[/quote]

#need you to stfu!

Why u so mad?

Because hash tagging is for twitter.
[/quote]and because you don’t need to say it 30 times.[/quote]
Yeah But I need one badly my gfx skills are sooo bad

item.title: New project not related to rs. Need gfx!
item.dc:creator: @mrbad23 mrbad23
item.description:
@mrbad23 wrote:

Bowser jr:

If you’re doing all that work of writing a client and server from scratch , don’t copy Evony, make your own game that is similar and avoid any copyright issues.

That is what I have decided to do. Evony likes to sue people. I wouldnt like to be sued.
#still need gfx!

Read full topic

item.title: New project not related to rs. Need gfx!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“mrbad23, post:8, topic:552008”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=670924.msg4486666#msg4486666 date=1434397840]
I hope you have experience in Adobe Flash, Evony is entirely made up of it.

Also: Because the game is in Flash… You could use swf decoders to try and rip their “Client” (It’s actually one .SWF that loads up a series of others…), then reverse engineer it, similar to how RSPS did it.
[/quote]
Yeah but I would like to make an actual client instead of people playing @via browser[/quote]
Then you’re going to have to write the game in a different language entirely.

Read full topic

item.title: New project not related to rs. Need gfx!
item.dc:creator: @mrbad23 mrbad23
item.description:
@mrbad23 wrote:

[quote=“Tree, post:4, topic:552008”]What are your skills?
They are definitely not the best but i’ve developed in the rsps field for a few years now and, have done small other java things unrelated to rsps. So I am familiar with java too a certain extent. I also know very very basic knowledge of C havent really done too much with it.[/quote]

Pure_:

This, are you expecting somebody to write you the first ever evony server while you sit on your ass?

No I am not, I will be commiting just as much time if not more as anyone else on the team.
“I want to make the first every evony private server.”
"Me and a one of my other mates of gonna give this a try."
EDIT:I guess I would be sitting on my ass coding

Read full topic

There are no new updates.
